data.name: Skybox3D
data.detailed_description:
CS:GO match replay and analysis software used by the top professional Counterstrike teams and tournaments around the world.

Skybox3D provides a unique match replay experience that gives you the insight and analysis to help you improve as a player and as a team. Some key features include:

View maps from anywhere and any angle
Instantly move back and forth through rounds
Turn buildings to glass ("Glassify")
Track player paths and actions
View the POV of any player
.... and much more

data.short_description: CS:GO match replay and analysis software used by the top professional Counterstrike teams and tournaments around the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics card
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

  • Storage: 10 GB available space
